LanguageData.EdgeDrop.textFriendly: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have arrived in transport pods nearby.

LanguageData.EdgeWalkInGroups.textFriendly: Friendly {0} from {1} have arrived nearby, approaching from multiple angles.

LanguageData.EdgeDropGroups.textEnemy: Several separate groups of {0} from {1} have arrived in transport pods nearby.
LanguageData.EdgeDropGroups.textFriendly: Several separate groups of friendly {0} from {1} have arrived in transport pods nearby.

LanguageData.CenterDrop.textFriendly: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have dropped in right on top of you!
LanguageData.CenterDrop.textWillArrive: {0_pawnsPluralDef} will arrive in transport pods right on top of you.
LanguageData.RandomDrop.textEnemy: A group of {0} from {1} have arrived in transport pods. Their pods went haywire and are landing scattered all over the area!
LanguageData.RandomDrop.textFriendly: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have arrived in transport pods. Their pods went haywire and are landing scattered all over the area!

LanguageData.MechClusterDrop.textWillArrive: The mech cluster will arrive in drop pods.
